com.icontrol.camera

Class OpenHomeCameraGatewayDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icontrol.camera.OpenHomeCameraGatewayDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpenHomeCameraDriver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OpenHomeCameraGatewayModule

    public abstract class OpenHomeCameraGatewayDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpenHomeCameraDriver
    Service class that implements the several Open Home camera command access methods.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    wek

      • getSystemPollNotifications

        public com.icontrol.openhome.data.ResponseStatus getSystemPollNotifications(java.lang.String linger)
                                                                     throws CameraException
        Poll for system notifications for the specified length of time.

        Command: /OpenHome/System/Poll/notifications

        Parameters:
        linger - - time to wait in seconds before responding to a request (if no notification is available). If a notification is available or becomes available during waiting, a response is sent as soon as possible without waiting for the linger expiration.
        Returns:
        - ResponseStatus (NotificationWrapper)
        Throws:
        CameraException

      • issueCameraCommand

        public abstract com.icontrol.openhome.data.ResponseStatus issueCameraCommand(java.lang.String requestType,
                                                           java.lang.String command,
                                                           java.lang.String[] parameters,
                                                           java.lang.String id,
                                                           java.lang.Object parameterObject)
                                                                      throws CameraException
        Build the HTTP request and send it to the device.
        Specified by:
        issueCameraCommand in interface OpenHomeCameraDriver
        Parameters:
        requestType - - (required) HTTP request type (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE)
        locationURL - - (required) server (device) URL
        command - - (required) restful path of service
        parameters - - (may be null) Http request parameters as an array ordered as "name","value" pairs.
        parameterObject - - (may be null) object to be xml encoded and passed with http request as a parameter (e.g. <DeviceInfo>).
        Returns:
        - Response
        Throws:
        CameraException
